00026 #ifndef __L4_KTRACE_H__
00027 #define __L4_KTRACE_H__
00028 
00029 #include <l4/sys/types.h>
00030 #include <l4/sys/ktrace_events.h>
00031 
00036 enum {
00037   LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS = 16,
00038 };
00039 
00044 // keep in sync with fiasco/src/jabi/jdb_ktrace.cpp
00045 typedef struct
00046 {
00048   l4_tracebuffer_entry_t *tracebuffer;
00050   l4_umword_t size;
00052   volatile l4_uint64_t version;
00053 } l4_tracebuffer_status_window_t;
00054 
00059 // keep in sync with fiasco/src/jabi/jdb_ktrace.cpp
00060 typedef struct
00061 {
00062   l4_tracebuffer_status_window_t window[2];
00064   volatile l4_tracebuffer_entry_t * current_entry;
00066   l4_umword_t logevents[LOG_EVENT_MAX_EVENTS];
00067 
00069   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_ns;
00071   l4_umword_t scaler_tsc_to_us;
00073   l4_umword_t scaler_ns_to_tsc;
00074 
00076   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_context_switch;
00078   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_addr_space_switch;
00080   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_failed;
00082   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_shortcut_success;
00084   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_irq;
00086   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_ipc_long;
00088   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_page_fault;
00091   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_io_fault;
00093   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_task_create;
00095   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_schedule;
00099   volatile l4_umword_t cnt_iobmap_tlb_flush;
00100 
00101 } l4_tracebuffer_status_t;
00102 
00109 L4_INLINE l4_tracebuffer_status_t *
00110 fiasco_tbuf_get_status(void);
00111 
00118 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t
00119 fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys(void);
00120 
00128 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00129 fiasco_tbuf_log(const char *text);
00130 
00142 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00143 fiasco_tbuf_log_3val(const char *text, unsigned v1, unsigned v2, unsigned v3);
00144 
00152 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00153 fiasco_tbuf_log_binary(const unsigned char *data);
00154 
00159 L4_INLINE void
00160 fiasco_tbuf_clear(void);
00161 
00166 L4_INLINE void
00167 fiasco_tbuf_dump(void);
00168 
00172 L4_INLINE void
00173 fiasco_timer_disable(void);
00174 
00179 L4_INLINE void
00180 fiasco_timer_enable(void);

00182 /*****************************************************************************
00183  *** Implementation
00184  *****************************************************************************/
00185 
00186 L4_INLINE l4_tracebuffer_status_t *
00187 fiasco_tbuf_get_status(void)
00188 {
00189   l4_tracebuffer_status_t *tbuf;
00190   asm("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : "=a" (tbuf) : "0" (0));
00191   return tbuf;
00192 }
00193 
00194 L4_INLINE l4_addr_t
00195 fiasco_tbuf_get_status_phys(void)
00196 {
00197   l4_addr_t tbuf_phys;
00198   asm("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : "=a" (tbuf_phys) : "0" (5));
00199   return tbuf_phys;
00200 }
00201 
00202 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00203 fiasco_tbuf_log(const char *text)
00204 {
00205   l4_umword_t offset;
00206   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00207         : "=a" (offset)
00208         : "a" (1), "d" (text));
00209   return offset;
00210 }
00211 
00212 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00213 fiasco_tbuf_log_3val(const char *text, unsigned v1, unsigned v2, unsigned v3)
00214 {
00215   l4_umword_t offset;
00216   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00217         : "=a" (offset)
00218         : "a" (4), "d" (text), "c" (v1), "S" (v2), "D" (v3));
00219   return offset;
00220 }
00221 
00222 L4_INLINE void
00223 fiasco_tbuf_clear(void)
00224 {
00225   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (2));
00226 }
00227 
00228 L4_INLINE void
00229 fiasco_tbuf_dump(void)
00230 {
00231   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (3));
00232 }
00233 
00234 L4_INLINE void
00235 fiasco_timer_disable(void)
00236 {
00237   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (6));
00238 }
00239 
00240 L4_INLINE void
00241 fiasco_timer_enable(void)
00242 {
00243   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al" : : "a" (7));
00244 }
00245 
00246 L4_INLINE l4_umword_t
00247 fiasco_tbuf_log_binary(const unsigned char *data)
00248 {
00249   l4_umword_t offset;
00250   asm volatile("int $3; cmpb $29, %%al"
00251                : "=a" (offset)
00252                : "a" (8), "d" (data));
00253   return offset;
00254 }
00255 
00256 #endif
